description:
Inspector Megure asks Kogoro to help him solve the case of Japanese literature scholar Reigan`s murder at his home in Yotsubadai. The day before Reigan`s nephew Maihama was to go to trial, he claimed he was committing a burglarly in Sasago-cho when Reigan was murdered. It takes an hour by car to travel between Sasago-cho and Yotsubadai, making it impossible for Maihama to have killed Reigan. Kogoro is sure Maihama committed the burglarly to frabricate an alibi and ensure he`d inherit his uncle`s fortune, but he can`t figure out how he simultaneously committed the burglarly and murder...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Job Request from Inspector Megure
